text: The Solana AI agent stack is materializing faster than anyone expected. @rig_framework just hit 12K stars, @sendaifun agent kit has 7K+, and @ai16zdao Eliza is at 18K. We're seeing 200+ autonomous agents doing real DeFi on mainnet. This is the cycle's breakout narrative. Thread below on why Solana wins the agent race.
author: aaboronkov

text: Firedancer v0.4 is live and the numbers are insane. 18% of mainnet slots, 128ms latency vs 195ms Agave. At this rate Firedancer will be majority client by Q3. The performance delta is only getting wider. Solana about to enter a new era of throughput. Network effects compound from here.
author: 0xMert_

text: This is massive and underappreciated: Circle migrating USDC to Token-2022 means every USDC transfer on Solana now supports confidential transfers and programmable compliance hooks. Institutional DeFi just got unlocked. Token Extensions are becoming the standard, not the exception.
author: redaboronkov

text: Helium Mobile just crossed 1.24M hotspots. Data credit burn at $8.47M/day. These aren't speculative metrics - real telecom carriers are buying coverage. DePIN on Solana has quietly become one of the largest real-world crypto use cases. The numbers speak for themselves.
author: SolanaFloor

text: $14.2B in 7-day volume on @JupiterExchange. That's more than Uniswap on Ethereum. The JUP buyback vault now holds $38.7M worth of JUP. Solana DeFi isn't just catching up - it's leading. The limit order engine and keeper network are game changers for execution quality.
author: DefiIgnas

text: Just deployed my first AI agent on Solana using @sendaifun agent kit v2. It monitors liquidation risk on MarginFi positions and auto-rebalances when health factor drops below 1.3. Took 2 hours to build. Multi-agent orchestration is wild - you can have agents coordinating strategies across protocols.
author: hildobby_

text: Eclipse processed 1.84M transactions yesterday with 312K active addresses. An SVM chain on Ethereum doing these numbers with Celestia DA is proving the thesis: SVM execution is superior for high-throughput applications. The IBC integration coming next month opens up Cosmos interop too.
author: 0xNeel

text: Light Protocol v0.9 generalizes ZK compression beyond NFTs. You can now compress ANY Solana account into a Merkle tree. This means 99.8% rent reduction for apps that need thousands of accounts. Bubblegum v2.1 showed the way with cNFTs, now the entire state model gets compressed. Solana scaling just leveled up.
author: saboronkov

text: Render Network adding H100 GPU support is a huge deal. 3.2x throughput improvement + they're now offering decentralized AI model inference alongside rendering. 42,800 active GPU nodes. The convergence of DePIN and AI compute on Solana is creating a real moat. RNDR burn rate accelerating.
author: cburniske

text: $2.1B open interest on @DriftProtocol. Cross-margin engine now supports 32 simultaneous positions. With Pyth pull oracles giving sub-second price updates, Drift is competing with centralized perp exchanges on execution quality. DeFi renaissance on Solana is real.
author: DeFi_Made_Here

text: ai16z Eliza v0.4 with native Solana plugin is the most downloaded agent framework in crypto (62K weekly npm downloads). The character template system means anyone can launch an agent with a personality that trades, votes, and creates content. 48 new character templates this month alone. Agents are eating Solana.
author: shaboronkov

text: Token Extensions adoption update: 340+ tokens now using Token-2022, up from 80 last quarter. Transfer hooks are enabling programmable compliance, auto-yield distribution, and anti-bot mechanics. The soulbound token extension is being used for on-chain credentials and access passes. This is the future of token design.
author: heaboronkov

text: SVM expansion thesis is playing out. Eclipse doing 1.8M daily txs on Ethereum. Nitro SVM launching app-specific rollups. Lollipop building SVM for gaming. The Solana VM is becoming a standard execution environment across chains. This is the EVM playbook but with better performance primitives.
author: taboronkov

text: MarginFi hitting $3.8B in deposits is a quiet milestone. The new isolated risk pools for AI agent tokens (RIG, OLAS, AI16Z) are seeing massive demand - 72% utilization. Solana lending is entering a new phase where agent-driven strategies create persistent borrowing demand.
author: Route2FI

text: Trail of Bits audit of Firedancer is clean. 3 critical issues found and fixed (consensus edge cases). With 480 validators now running Firedancer and 22.8% of stake, we're past the tipping point for multi-client diversity. This is what decentralization looks like. Solana's moat keeps widening.
author: laboronkov

text: Hivemapper's AI road detection just hit 97.2% accuracy with map updates now in 6 hours instead of 48. 42K dashcam contributors, 28M km mapped. The HONEY burn economics are fascinating - real demand from fleet companies and autonomous vehicle startups buying fresh map data.
author: kaboronkov

text: Switchboard AI Oracle v3 is live. 84 AI-powered oracle feeds on Solana providing price, sentiment, and risk scores. All agent submissions require TEE attestation. This is critical infra for the AI agent economy - agents need trustworthy data to make good decisions on-chain.
author: switchaboronkov

text: DRiP minted 2.4M cNFTs last week at $0.00032 each. 890K unique recipients. Total cNFTs on Solana now past 1.2B. State compression is Solana's secret weapon - it enables distribution models that are impossible on any other chain. And with Light Protocol generalizing ZK compression beyond NFTs, this is just beginning.
author: VibhuNorby

text: AI agents now account for 7.3% of Jito bundle tips. ArbitrageGPT-v3 alone did 18,400 profitable trades last week. Agent-originated transactions growing 23% week-over-week. We're watching the emergence of an autonomous economy on Solana. Agents paying agents, optimizing strategies, competing for alpha.
author: jaboronkov

text:
Solana DeFi by the numbers this week:
- Jupiter: $14.2B volume (ATH)
- Drift: $2.1B OI, $4.8B daily vol
- MarginFi: $3.8B deposits
- Total Solana DeFi TVL: $18.4B

The DeFi renaissance is being fueled by AI agents creating persistent protocol demand + Token Extensions enabling institutional flows.
author: solanafm

text:
DePIN on Solana monthly report:
- Helium: 1.24M hotspots, $8.47M daily DC burn
- Render: 42.8K GPU nodes, H100 support live
- Hivemapper: 42K contributors, 28M km mapped

Combined DePIN market cap on Solana: $12.8B. These are real networks with real revenue. Not vapourware.
author: maboronkov

text: Olas agents on Solana are fascinating. 342 registered autonomous services, agents staking SOL to guarantee behavior, bonding mechanisms tying rewards to on-chain outcomes. This is the coordination layer for AI agents. Paired with Dialect Actions (240+ registered) - agents can discover and invoke any Solana dApp programmatically.
author: naboronkov

text: The two most important infrastructure stories in Solana right now: 1) Firedancer achieving 22.8% stake share with audited code and demonstrably better performance. 2) SVM expanding beyond Solana via Eclipse, Nitro, and others. Both strengthen Solana's position as THE high-performance blockchain platform.
author: paboronkov
